text: Ani tumacyapurvi amhi vastivalyammadhye jevadhedekhila paigambara pathavile te sarva purusaca hote, jyancyakade amhi vahayi (prakasana) utaravita rahili kaya dharativara ya lokanni hinduna phiruna pahile nahi ki tyancyapurvi ho'una gelelya lokanca kasa parinama (anta) jhala? Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya rakhanarya va tyaca ajnabhanga karanyapasuna dura rahanarya lokankarita akhiratace ghara phara uttama ahe. Kaya tarihi tumhi dhyani gheta nahi
